title: Regulation (EEC) No 675/72 of the Commission of 29 March 1972 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1105/68 on detailed rules for granting aid for skimmed milk for use as feed
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 675/72 OF THE COMMISSION of 29 March 1972 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1105/68 on detailed rules for granting aid for skimmed milk for use as feed
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 1105/68 are hereby repealed:    1. Article 2 (4),
2. Article 3,
3. Article 5 (2) (g),
4. Article 11.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1972.
1 OJ No L 148, 28.6.1968, p. 13.  2 OJ No L 148, 3.7.1971, p. 3.  3 OJ No L 169, 18.7.1968, p. 4.  4 OJ No L 77, 1.4.1971, p. 9.  5 OJ No L 184, 29.7.1968, p. 24.  6 OJ No L 186, 30.7.1969, p. 11.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 March 1972.
For the Commission
The President
S.L. MANSHOLT
